text: Ic Cnud cyng grete mine biscopes & mine eorles & ealle mine þegenas on ðan sciran ðær mine preostas on Sanctes Paules mynstre habbað land inne freondlice.

& ic ciþe eow þæt ic wylle þæt hig beon heora sace here & socna weorðe, tolles & teames binnan tid & buton tid & swa full & swa forþ swa hig hæfdon on æniges cynges deage fyrmest on ællan ðingan, binnan burh & butan.
& ic nelle geþafian þæt nan man æt ænigum þingan heom misbeode.
& þyses is to gewitnesse ægelnoð arcebiscop & ælfric arcebiscop & ælwi biscop & ælfwine biscop & Duduce biscop & Godwine eorl & Leofric eorl & Osgod Clape & Thored & oþre genoge.
God hine aweorge þe þis awænde.
